TopicTitle: Unique selection of symmetrical decoupler for fuel pipe

Articles.Content:
Hello kerbonauts,

when i attach some deocupler in symmetical mode, how i can select one by one for detachment with fuel pipe?

On KSP i remember it was possible, but on KSP2 i can' t find a way...

 

many thanks!!
Take just one element out of symmetry, you mean? Is that included in KSP2 yet?

No, ok, i think i must to add for exemple 6 engine and with pipe connect on by one for finish the first, then the second and so on to sixth.

bu ti better use this in symmetrical mode twice per time...

I used that in KSP but i don t remeber how to use...

many thanks i solved
